about_the_game:
Equip your hero with this armor skin and show everyone who's the real Executor!*

Please note: The Executor Armor Skin is available both in skirmish and in campaign, there are no restrictions.
There is a combat suit called "Executor Armor", which is for the host only and not related to the Executor Armor Skin in any way.

*This item is an in-game cosmetic only.
